html: Comfortable with #brexit text as the UK is leaving the EU’s Customs Union and the Single Market, and - vitally - we can pursue other trade deals. IF we needed to enter the backstop (which neither side wants) to enable free-flow of goods, it would only be for a temporary period.
text:
Comfortable with #brexit text as the UK is leaving the EU’s Customs Union and the Single Market, and - vitally - we can pursue other trade deals. 
IF we needed to enter the backstop (which neither side wants) to enable free-flow of goods, it would only be for a temporary period.
